title: Chapter 2 Concept Map: Displaying Categorical Data
description: Interactive hierarchical concept map showing key concepts from Chapter 2 on Displaying Categorical Data. Includes Organizing Data (Frequency Table, Relative Frequency, Cumulative Frequency), Single Variable Displays (Bar Graph, Pie Chart), Two Variable Analysis (Two-Way Table, Marginal/Conditional Distribution), and Association (Direction, Strength). Features hover tooltips with definitions and click-to-highlight branch functionality.
